data.title: PTV Logistics GmbH launched as operating company
data.meta_description: In an exciting strategic move, PTV Planung Transport Verkehr GmbH announces the intra-group spin-off of its logistics business unit into PTV Logistics GmbH, a subsidiary of PTV Planung Transport Verkehr GmbH.
data.text:
PTVâ€™s logistics business unit encapsulates over four decades of industry excellence. As a global software entity specializing in transport logistics, it offers an array of groundbreaking solutions, from the initial planning phase to execution. Among its signature offerings are the record-breaking route planning and optimisation algorithms. Such innovations are now positioning PTV Logistics GmbH to significantly assist logistics companies in automating their operations. Complementing this is their state-of-the-art Cloud platform for real-time transport tracking and management, delivering comprehensive oversight of the delivery process.

Clients and stakeholders can anticipate a seamless transition. All obligations and contracts previously under the "Logistics Germany" business unit will be effortlessly spun off into PTV Logistics GmbH, demanding no manual intervention from clients. The expert team from the prior business unit will continue to serve with undiminished dedication, ensuring the provision of top-tier service.

Note for Clients: Engaging with your familiar contacts remains unchanged. Clients can reach out using [firstname.lastname]@ptvgroup.com. However, a gentle reminder to update company data previously registered for PTV Planung Transport Verkehr GmbH.

The management at PTV Logistics GmbH is poised to handle any questions regarding the new entity, contractual transitions, or their innovative software solutions. The team warmly acknowledges the unwavering trust clients have exhibited and is keen on cultivating and enhancing these partnerships moving forward.
